name: test_e2e_with_logs[024_SQLI_BLIND_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BLIND_003` |
| **Name** | Table count discovery |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND (SELECT COUNT(table_name) FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema=database())>10 --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20COUNT%28table_name%29%20FROM%20information_schema.tables%20WHERE%20table_schema%3Ddatabase%28%29%29%3E10%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~72000ms
- **Timestamp**: 13:44:01.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BLIND_003-1771076641875-wsk6ej pattern_id=SQLI_BLIND_003 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20COUNT%28table_name%29%20FROM%20information_schema.tables%20WHERE%20table_schema%3Ddatabase%28%29%29%3E10%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
